mods.abstract: Two color window card (blue and red on white) announcing Fitzgerald's 1990 American Music Festival featuring C. J. Chenier and the Red Hot Louisiana Band, Sonny Landreth and the Goners, Ellington Dynasty, Paul Cebar and the Milwaukeeans, Lonnie Brooks, John Hammond, Spanic Boys, Memphis Nighthawks, Bruce Daigrepont's Cajun Band, Big Shoulder, Terrance Simean and the Mallet Playboys, File, Little Charlie and the Nightcats, and Kinsey Report on June 29 and 30 and July 1 and 3. Poster features a metal photoplate of an eighth note.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
